summary: This mod add a  new \'7\' CrossBows, \'14\' kind of Bolts and Dwemer killing machines on Field
descriptionHtml:
Need DawnGuard DLC


I Used only vanilla meshes

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------


* 1.1 update 

add game pad vibration


* option file

- can you feel it Mod -

add vanilla crossbow vibration

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------






This mod add 7 Crossbows & 14 bolts at smithingForge Dwarven or Steel tab

 
Need dwarven smithing perk

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Dwarven War Crossbows Mod
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------



Upgrade Tree




  Dwarven War Cross Bow +@   ?   Enhanced Dwarven War Cross Bow

 Enhanced Dwarven War Cross Bow +@   ?       Dwarven War Machine   (Explosion Type Ammo) 
                                                               
   
 Enhanced Dwarven War Cross Bow +@   ?           Dwarven War Gear   (Shooter Type Ammo)

                                                                                        
 Dwarven War Machine    +   Dwarven War Gear  +@   ?      G.O.W     (use all ammo)



                                              


V.Hunter (Stand Alone) 



D.Hunter (Stand Alone) 



--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Bolts
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Korean Baby arrow Poison

large Bolt

grenade

gear Mine

golden Large bolt

golden Power Bolt

golden Mine bolt

hand cannon

star shell

ShotGun Ammo

Steel ball ammo

GOW ammo

D.slayer x1

D.slayer x3 (add dragon extra damage)




* If you upgrade crossbow, you may make more Bolt 

 and make additional can you must possess crossbow in your inventory.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

If you want craft some kind of crossbows 

you have to kill some creatures and take their Heart 


V.Hunter : \\\\\\\'Alpha\'///

D.Hunter : \\\\\\\'God of destruction\'///

G.O.W : \\\\\\\'God of War\'///

ex) when you kill \'Alpha\" and take his heart 
      then you can see \'V.Hunter\' at Smithing Forge seel tab






------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Golden Army Mod
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

this mod add Powerful Dwarven Robot on Field (1000~1300) 

and every Creature is bigger(x1.5) and stronger than before 


You can feel  Dwemers invasion










-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Siege \'Bow\' Collection 
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12034
author: Rizing

files.name: Golden Army only Dwarven Killing Machine
